item.title: Coinbase 投资印度 CoinDCX，估值 24.5 亿美元
item.description: Coinbase Global 已经投资了总部位于孟买的 CoinDCX，该交易所运营商正努力深化其在印度和中东地区的业务。【原文：Coinbase Global has invested in Mumbai-based CoinDCX as the exchange operator seeks to deepen its exposure to India and the Middle East.】

item.title: 印度股市可能因美联储降息希望带动亚洲市场反弹
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts, we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: KKR 和 PAG 接近以超过 26 亿美元的价格收购札幌房地产公司
item.description: 据一位熟知内情的人士透露，KKR & Co.和 PAG 的联合竞标已成为收购啤酒制造商札幌控股有限公司（Sapporo Holdings Ltd.）房地产控股权的主要候选者，交易价值超过 4000 亿日元（约合 26 亿美元）。【原文：A joint bid from KKR & Co. and PAG has emerged as the leading candidate to buy the real estate holdings of beermaker Sapporo Holdings Ltd. in a deal worth over ¥400 billion ($2.6 billion), according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印度央行据说将恢复外汇掉期以帮助流动性
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度央行已开始新一轮外汇掉期交易，以支撑流动性，因为最近的货币干预措施导致银行系统现金流失。【原文：India’s central bank has started a fresh round of foreign exchange swaps that shore up liquidity, according to people familiar with the development, as its recent currency interventions drain cash from the banking system.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 CBA 公司表示科曼将再担任三年首席执行官
item.description: 澳大利亚联邦银行（Commonwealth Bank of Australia）主席保罗-奥马利（Paul O'Malley）表示，他有意让首席执行官马特-科明（Matt Comyn）继续担任这家澳大利亚最大银行的老板，至少到 2028 年。【原文：Commonwealth Bank of Australia Chair Paul O’Malley signaled his intention for Chief Executive Officer Matt Comyn to remain as boss of the country’s biggest lender until at least 2028.】

item.title: 中国九月份通货紧缩有所缓解，但物价跌势依然存在
item.description: 中国的通货紧缩在 9 月份有所缓解，使中国有望出现自 20 世纪 70 年代末市场改革以来最长的经济范围内的价格连续下跌。【原文：China’s deflation eased in September, leaving the country on track for the longest streak of economy-wide price declines since market reforms in the late 1970s.】

item.title: 中国在贸易紧张局势中加强人民币防卫
item.description: 在与美国贸易关系日益紧张的背景下，中国周三通过每日参考汇率加强了货币防御。【原文：China boosted its currency defense on Wednesday via the daily reference rate amid mounting trade tensions with the US.】

item.title: 特朗普与中国食用油结怨时，食用油销量已在下降
item.description: 早在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普将中国出口到美国的废食用油作为他与中国政府贸易战的最新热点之前，中国出口到美国的废食用油就已经在减少。【原文：Chinese exports of used cooking oil to the US were already in retreat well before President Donald Trump chose them as the latest flashpoint in his trade war with Beijing.】

item.title: 韩国出台新政策抑制炙手可热的房地产市场
item.description: 韩国推出了新一轮措施，旨在控制红火的房地产市场，加大力度抑制投机性购房，因为政策制定者正在权衡降息，以支持放缓的经济。【原文：South Korea rolled out a new round of measures aimed at reining in a red-hot housing market, stepping up efforts to curb speculative buying as policymakers weigh interest-rate cuts to bolster a slowing economy.】

item.title: 州立农场在伊利诺伊州房屋保险费调查中被起诉
item.description: 伊利诺伊州起诉州立农场火灾与伤亡保险公司，迫使其提供信息，以便对该公司快速上涨的房主保费进行调查。【原文：Illinois sued State Farm Fire and Casualty Insurance Co. to force it to provide information for an investigation into the company’s rapidly rising premiums for homeowners.】

item.title: 阿根廷称美国财政部将继续支持比索
item.description: 经济部长路易斯-卡普托（Luis Caputo）表示，无论南美国家本月晚些时候的中期选举结果如何，美国仍将致力于与阿根廷保持 200 亿美元的货币互换额度。【原文：Economy Minister Luis Caputo said the US remains committed to a $20 billion currency-swap line with Argentina, regardless of the outcome of midterm elections in the South American nation later this month.】

item.title: 富裕王朝为普吉岛罕见的游艇码头筹资 1 亿美元
item.description: 一个多世纪以来，纳-拉农（Na-Ranong）家族一直与普吉岛的经济增长密切相关，早先以锡矿开采为起点，推动了普吉岛的经济发展，后来又转向开发豪华度假村。【原文：The Na-Ranong family has been closely linked to Phuket’s economic growth for more than a century, starting with tin mining that powered the island’s economy in earlier times before pivoting to develop luxury resorts.】

item.title: 孤星公司收购塑料零件制造商希伦布兰德的交易即将达成
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Lone Star Funds 正在就收购塑料零件和设备制造商 Hillenbrand Inc.【原文：Lone Star Funds is in advanced talks to acquire plastic parts and equipment maker Hillenbrand Inc., people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 苹果将在越南制造带屏幕和桌面机器人的 HomePod
item.description: 苹果公司正准备扩大其在越南的制造业务，这是苹果公司进军智能家居市场的一部分，也是苹果公司为减少对中国的依赖而做出的持续努力。【原文：Apple Inc. is preparing to expand its manufacturing operations in Vietnam as part of a push into the smart home market and an ongoing effort to lessen its dependence on China.】

item.title: 受美联储降息迹象和中美紧张局势影响，黄金交易接近历史纪录
item.description: 受中美摩擦升级和美联储今年将再降息两次的押注提振，黄金一路走高，创下历史新高。【原文：Gold edged higher toward a record, boosted by an escalation in US-China frictions and bets the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates twice more this year.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行亨特警惕核心通胀超预期
item.description: 澳大利亚储备银行行长助理莎拉-亨特（Sarah Hunter）表示，截至 9 月份的三个月中，澳大利亚的基本通胀率可能会比储备银行预期的要高，这表明劳动力市场和更广泛的经济状况依然紧张。【原文：Australia’s underlying inflation in the three months through September is likely to be stronger than the Reserve Bank had anticipated, Assistant Governor Sarah Hunter said, suggesting the labor market and broader economic conditions remain tight.】

item.title: 日本政治分裂为 20 年期债券销售带来新隐忧
item.description: 由于日本执政联盟的垮台引发了新的政治不确定性，投资者对周三的日本 20 年期国债拍卖持谨慎态度。【原文：Investors are cautious going into Japan’s 20-year government bond auction on Wednesday as the shock collapse of Japan’s ruling coalition fuels fresh political uncertainty.】

item.title: 香港交易所的 Bagri 呼吁 LME 市场加快现代化步伐
item.description: 伦敦金属交易所所有者香港交易及结算所的高级顾问 Apurv Bagri 认为，为了更快地实现现代化，伦敦金属交易所及其用户需要采取 "令人不舒服的 "措施。【原文：The London Metal Exchange and its users will need to take “uncomfortable” steps in order to modernize more quickly, according to Apurv Bagri, a senior adviser to the LME’s owner, Hong Kong Exchanges and Clearing.】

item.title: 供应过剩前景和中美紧张局势成为关注焦点，石油价格保持稳定
item.description: 石油跌至五个月低点后企稳，因为投资者权衡了预期的供应过剩和中美贸易紧张局势升级的影响。【原文：Oil steadied after falling to five-month low, as investors weighed an expected supply glut against the fallout of escalating US-China trade tensions.】

item.title: 魏尔指数显示，欧洲零售业的困境高于 2009 年的水平
item.description: 根据律师事务所 Weil Gotshal & Manges 专有指数的最新读数，欧洲零售和消费品行业的困境超过了 2009 年全球金融危机期间的水平。【原文：Distress in Europe’s retail and consumer-goods sector stands above levels seen during the global financial crisis in 2009, according to the latest reading of law firm Weil Gotshal & Manges’ proprietary index.】

item.title: 由于需求疲软，英国在过去一年中失去了 1500 多家住宅建筑商
item.description: 英国房屋建筑商的数量十年来首次出现下降，因为需求下滑有可能使政府建造 150 万套住宅的计划脱轨。【原文：The number of housebuilders in Britain is in decline for the first time in a decade, as a slump in demand threatens to derail the government’s plan to build 1.5 million homes.】

item.title: 戴蒙称在投资组合中持有黄金是 "半理性 "行为
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.首席执行官杰米-戴蒙（Jamie Dimon）表示，他认为持有黄金有一定的道理，但他拒绝透露是否认为贵金属在经历了历史性的上涨后被高估了。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. Chief Executive Officer Jamie Dimon said he sees some logic in owning gold, while declining to say whether he thinks the precious metal is overvalued after a historic run-up.】

item.title: 亚洲投资者将抛开贸易紧张局势：市场综述
item.description: 尽管周二贸易紧张局势重燃令华尔街感到紧张，但亚洲股市早盘似乎仍将反弹。美国期货价格持稳。【原文：Asian stocks looked set to rebound in early trading, even as renewed trade tensions rattled Wall Street on Tuesday. US futures were steady.】

item.title: 越南新航空公司押注旅游业繁荣能抵消拥挤的天空
item.description: 越南新成立的航空公司新福航空公司（Sun PhuQuoc Airways）计划在五年内购买 100 架空中客车公司和波音公司的喷气式飞机，以打入越南快速发展的旅游市场，并应对越南拥挤的天空。【原文：Startup Vietnamese carrier Sun PhuQuoc Airways plans to acquire a total of 100 Airbus SE and Boeing Co. jets within five years as it seeks to break into the country’s fast expanding tourism market and crack the nation’s congested skies.】

item.title: 丰田和日本的移民困境：外国人必不可少，但越来越不被接受
item.description:
在丰田市，移民为促进经济做出了贡献，同时也面临着政治上的反弹。【原文：

En la ciudad de Toyota, los inmigrantes contribuyen al impulso de la economía, al tiempo que se enfrentan a reacciones políticas adversas.

】

item.title: 加密货币 190 亿美元全军覆没显示出中心化的风险
item.description: 艾米丽-尼科尔（Emily Nicolle）从上周加密货币市场混乱的头条新闻中看到了风险。【原文：Emily Nicolle takes a look at the risk beyond the headlines of last week’s crypto market chaos.】

item.title: Medline 上半年净销售额达 135 亿美元，领先于 IPO
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Medline 将在首次公开募股时告诉潜在投资者，该公司 2025 年上半年的净销售额约为 135 亿美元，比去年增长约 9.7%。【原文：Medline is telling prospective investors in its initial public offering that it had about $13.5 billion in net sales in the first half of 2025, an increase of roughly 9.7% from last year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 赤字逼近，芝加哥将 RBC 信贷额度提高 1 亿美元
item.description: 芝加哥明年将面临约 10 亿美元的预算缺口，根据一份日期为 2021 年 12 月的协议修正案，芝加哥将与加拿大皇家银行资本市场（RBC Capital Markets）签订的循环信贷额度增加了 1 亿美元，并将到期日延长了两年多。【原文：Chicago, which faces a roughly $1 billion budget gap next year, has increased a revolving line of credit with RBC Capital Markets by $100 million and extended the maturity date by more than two years, according to an amendment to an agreement dating to December 2021.】

item.title: CEPU 签署谅解备忘录，帮助为 OpenAI 支持的阿根廷数据中心供电
item.description: 阿根廷最大的电力生产商 Central Puerto SA 公司签署了一份谅解备忘录，将为南美国家拟建的价值 250 亿美元的数据中心提供电力。【原文：Central Puerto SA, a top power producer in Argentina, signed a memorandum of understanding to help power a proposed $25 billion data center in the South American country.】

item.title: 特朗普警告将从波士顿撤走世界杯，从洛杉矶撤走奥运会
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统说，如果他认为波士顿和洛杉矶这两个城市准备不充分或条件不安全，他将寻求把 2026 年世界杯足球赛迁出波士顿，把 2028 年奥运会迁出洛杉矶。【原文：President Donald Trump said he would seek to move 2026 World Cup games out of Boston and shift the 2028 Olympics out of Los Angeles if he thought the cities weren’t properly prepared or if conditions were unsafe.】
